org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.project.ui

Interface LogicalViewProviders.CompileOnSaveBadge

  • Enclosing class:
    LogicalViewProviders

    public static interface LogicalViewProviders.CompileOnSaveBadge
    Compile on Save badge status. The LogicalViewProviders.CompileOnSaveBadge is used by LogicalViewProvider2 to enable or disable the project badge notifying an user about disabled compile on save.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isBadgeVisible()
      Badge visibility check.
      boolean isImportant(String propertyName)
      Checks if the changed property affects the compile on save visibility.

    • Method Detail

      • isBadgeVisible

        boolean isBadgeVisible()
        Badge visibility check.
        Returns:
        true if the badge should be visible

      • isImportant

        boolean isImportant(@NonNull
                    String propertyName)
        Checks if the changed property affects the compile on save visibility.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the name of changed property
        Returns:
        true if compile on save badge should be recalculated
